item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "Books may well be the only true magic." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Betty Smith
item.description: "Some people do crossword puzzles. I do books." -- Betty Smith

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Alan Bennett
item.description: "What she was finding also was how one book led to another, doors kept opening wherever she turned and the days weren't long enough for the reading she wanted to do." -- Alan Bennett

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Ramona Quimby as written by Beverly Cleary
item.description: "If she can't spell, why is she a librarian? Librarians should know how to spell." -- Ramona Quimby as written by Beverly Cleary

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "You don’t know what goes on in anyone’s life but your own. And when you mess with one part of a person’s life, you’re not messing with just that part. Unfortunately, you can’t be that precise and selective. When you mess with one part of a person’s life, you’re messing with their entire life. Everything. . . affects everything." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Judith Viorst
item.description: "Strength is the capacity to break a Hershey bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces." -- Judith Viorst

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Marcia Lynn McClure
item.description: "It is a severe cruelty inflicted upon women...that we should be the ones who so desperately need love...affection...acceptance.And yet, we suffer...many of us, for lack of it throughout our entire lives."-Shackles of Honor" -- Marcia Lynn McClure

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Just like there's always time for pain, there's always time for healing." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Life isn't fair. A fair's a place where you eat corn dogs and ride the ferris wheel." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Because who you are is supposed to be the easiest question in the world answer, right?" -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Sometimes even stuff you expect to happen can still hurt" -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "One's my favorite number. The word won being the past tense of win, and we can all say at the end of the day that we won once again, can't we? Some days making it to the end of the day is quite a victory." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "We all got to be winners sometimes. But what he didn’t understand was that we all had to be losers, too. Because you can’t have one without the other." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "I'd spend about an hour, my room darkening around me, wondering what the hell happened to make me so unsure of who I even was. Because who you are is supposed to be the easiest question in the world to answer, right? Only for me it hadn't been easy for a very long time." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "People do it all the time--assume that they "know" what's going on in someone else's head. That's impossible. And to think it's possible is a mistake. A really big mistake. A life-ruining one if you're not careful." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Being pretty isn't everything but sometimes being ugly is." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Time's never up", she whispered, not looking at me, but at my canvas. "Just like there's always time for pain, there's always time for healing. Of course there is." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "It seemed like way too much work, cleaning up my grief." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "It's okay for someone to let you win sometimes, you know,' he said, getting all serious. 'We don't always have to be the losers, Valerie. They may want to make us feel that way, but we're not. Sometimes we get to win, too." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Getting on with her life is important. But right now it may be more important to put the feelings out there, deal with them, and find a way to be okay with all that's happened." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "It was one of the constants of life. You are born, you die, you stand up when the bus doors open." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "I saw everyone, a shifting sea of discomfort and sadness, each person carrying his own pain, each telling her own stories, no story more or less tragic or triumphant than any other." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Some days making it to the end of the day is quite the victory. -- Bea" -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "I don’t know if it’s possible to take hate away from people. Not even people like us, who’ve seen firsthand what hate can do. We’re all hurting. We’re all going to be hurting for a long time. And we, probably more than anyone else out there, will be searching for a new reality every day. A better one." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "What could he say about a future to those parents who couldn't let go of the past, who could do nothing but watch their hopes for their children's futures fade away, their children gone for more than a year now and never coming back? What could he say to the rest of us, so marred by what happened within those hallowed halls of education we knew and once loved? There would be no sweet memories -- those would be forever eclipsed." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "People talked. Let them talk. Nothing I could do to stop them. They knew the thousand words, but they didn't know the rest of the story." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Just concentrate on being in the moment”, he said. “Don’t read into things. See what’s really there ok?" -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "It'd felt good to be part of an "us," with the same thoughts, the same feelings, the same miseries." -- Jennifer Brown
